page.title: 07FARMING
page.content:
3 {HORTICULTURE}_ Godly's Rose Centre has 5 acres of land and was established 20 years ago, it was a poultry farm before this. The centre employs 3 people but an extra part_time help is employed at weekends.
4{ HORSES}_ Most farmers in the area keep 1 or more horses, mainly for riding. There is one riding stable in the area _ Harpendenbury which has stables, a school and grazing fields. The horses are ridden along local bridleways and gallops can be taken on Kinsbourne Green Common only a mile from the stable.
